column1: Two guards at an ICE detention center in Louisiana have each died after testing positive for coronavirus.
SEE PHOTOS | Coronavirus across America: Virus cases over 1 million as states decide on steps to reopen
An Upper East Side tenant alleged smoked so much during the coronavirus lockdown it has created a toxic environment for neighbors. Now she's being sued.
Fifty-two people who took part in the Wisconsin presidential primary election tested positive for coronavirus.

NYC shelters are rescuing pets that were left behind by people who died from coronavirus. Shelters have seen an increase in cases of people who could no longer care for their pets or left them behind.
Los Angeles County has received the go-ahead to enter its second phase of reopening amid the ongoing coronavirus crisis despite reporting 14,000 new infections in the last two weeks alone.
U.S. consumer confidence stabilized in May, indicating Americans are optimistic that the economic drubbing from the coronavirus pandemic will be short-lived. https://trib.al/8oB8ddq
